title: Size auditor Configuration
description: Configuration file for the Size Auditor tool

sizeTolerance.description: The tolerance limit above which Size Auditor would fail a pull request

trackingEntity.description: The entity that is audited for size regressions by Size Auditor

devopsDropFolderName.description: The name of the drop location containing build artifacts

devopsAssemblyArtifactName.description: The name of the artifact folder on Azure Devops that contains information related to Assembly sizes for the build

devopsWebpackStatsArtifactName.description: The name of the artifact folder on Azure Devops that contains information related to Webpack sizes for the build
